      • setCamera

        public void setCamera​(Camera camera)
        Description copied from interface: VisionProvider
        Sets the Camera that the VisionProvider should use for image capture. This is called during setup and will only be called once.
        Specified by:

      • getTemplateMatches

        public java.util.List<VisionProvider.TemplateMatch> getTemplateMatches​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage template)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempt to find matches of the given template within the current camera frame. Matches are returned as TemplateMatch objects which contain a Location in Camera coordinates. The results are sorted best score to worst score.
        Specified by:
        getTemplateMatches in interface VisionProvider
        Parameters:
